channel_pub_cfg = <mypy.lib.playwright.publish_config.PublishConfig object at 0x7ffab7befa30>
channel_cfg = {'channel_name': 'Nursing Fundamentals', 'channel_url': 'https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQrdx7rRsKfV7rYMLXUs8L...escription': 'RN 注册护士考试资料 #HKRN #护士懂护士 #护士长 #注册护士 ', 'latest_publish_time': '0512-1005', 'publish_mod': 'timing'}, ...}
publish_cfg = {'collection_name': 'HKRN/RN备考', 'description': 'RN 注册护士考试资料 #HKRN #护士懂护士 #护士长 #注册护士 ', 'latest_publish_time': '0512-1005', 'publish_mod': 'timing'}
upload_record = {'channels': [{'channel_name': 'Nursing Fundamentals', 'channel_url': 'https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQrdx7rR...cription': 'RN 注册护士考试资料 #HKRN #护士懂护士 #护士长 #注册护士 ', 'latest_publish_time': '0512-1005', 'publish_mod': 'timing'}, ...}]}

    def _publish_video(self, every_video, video_fullpath, video_title, gen,
                       first_video_published, to_platforms, channel_pub_cfg,
                       channel_cfg, publish_cfg, upload_record):
        # 已发布的平台
        published_platforms = every_video.get('published', [])
    
        # 待发布的平台
        to_publish_platforms = []
        for item in to_platforms:
            if item in published_platforms:
                LOG.info('《%s》已发布到 [%s] 平台',
                         every_video.get('title'), item)
                continue
            to_publish_platforms.append(item)
    
        LOG.debug('----- 视频信息: %s', every_video)
        publish_handler = PublishHandler(publish_files=video_fullpath,
                                         work_path=self._work_path)
    
        # 第一个视频立即发布，后续的再定时发布
        # XXX first_video_published 有问题，上层是值传递的，每次到这里这个值都是 False
        # XXX 现在改成 list 让他支持引用传递
        if Config.pulibsh_first_video_now and not first_video_published[0]:
            LOG.info('立即发布监控到的第一条视频《%s》', video_title)
            channel_pub_cfg.publish_mod = Const.PUBLISH_NOW
            channel_pub_cfg.publish_time = datetime.now()
            first_video_published[0] = True
        else:
            # 定时发布，获取下一个发布时间
            channel_pub_cfg.publish_mod = channel_cfg.get(
                'publish_mod', Const.PUBLISH_TIMING)
            channel_pub_cfg.publish_time = next(gen)
        # 设置发布标题（默认使用视频文件名作为标题）
        channel_pub_cfg.title = video_title
        channel_pub_cfg.to_platforms = to_publish_platforms
        publish_result = publish_handler.publish(channel_pub_cfg)
    
        if not any(publish_result.values()):
            err_msg = f'任意一个平台都没发布成功: {publish_result}'
>           raise Exception(err_msg)
E           Exception: 任意一个平台都没发布成功: {'douyin': False, 'xiaohongshu': False}
